contentrichtext.text: {{unsourced|date=January 2009}} {{MedalTableTop}} {{MedalSport|Men's [[Basketball]]}} {{MedalCountry | the {{URS}} }} {{MedalCompetition|[[Olympic Games]]}} {{MedalGold|[[1972 Summer Olympics|Munich 1972]] | [[Basketball at the 1972 Summer Olympics|Team]]}} {{MedalBronze|[[1968 Summer Olympics|Mexico City 1968]] | [[Basketball at the 1968 Summer Olympics|Team]]}} {{MedalCompetition|[[FIBA World Championship|World Championship]]}} {{MedalGold| [[1967 FIBA World Championship|1967 Montevideo]] |[[Soviet Union national basketball team|USSR]]}} {{MedalEuropeanChampionships}} {{MedalGold|[[EuroBasket 1965|1965 Soviet Union]]|USSR}} {{MedalGold|[[EuroBasket 1967|1967 Finland]]|USSR}} {{MedalGold|[[EuroBasket 1969|1969 Italy]]|USSR}} {{MedalGold|[[EuroBasket 1971|1971 West Germany]]|USSR}} {{MedalBronze|[[EuroBasket 1973|1973 Spain]]|USSR}} {{MedalBottom}} '''Zurab Aleksandrovich Sakandelidze''' ({{lang-ka|'''ზურაბ საკანდელიძე'''}}; {{lang-ru|'''Зураб Александрович Саканделидзе'''}}; born August 9, 1945 in [[Kutaisi]] – January 25, 2004 in [[Tbilisi]]) was a [[Georgia (country)|Georgian]] [[basketball]] player who won [[gold]] with the [[Soviet Union|Soviet]] basketball team in [[Basketball at the 1972 Summer Olympics]]. He trained at [[Dynamo (sports society)|Dynamo]] [[BC Dinamo Tbilisi|club]] in [[Tbilisi]]. {{Soviet Union squad EuroBasket 1965}} {{Soviet Union squad EuroBasket 1967}} {{Soviet Union squad EuroBasket 1969}} {{Soviet Union squad EuroBasket 1971}} {{Soviet Union squad EuroBasket 1973}} {{Soviet Union Squad 1967 FIBA World Championship}} {{Footer 1968 Olympic Bronze Medalists Basketball Men}} {{Footer 1972 Olympic Champions Basketball Men}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Sakandelidze, Zurab | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Basketball player | DATE OF BIRTH = August 9, 1945 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = January 25, 2004 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Sakandelidze, Zurab}} [[Category:Basketball players from Georgia (country)]] [[Category:Soviet basketball players]] [[Category:1945 births]] [[Category:2004 deaths]] [[Category:BC Dinamo Tbilisi]] [[Category:Olympic basketball players of the Soviet Union]] [[Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union]] [[Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union]] [[Category:Basketball players at the 1968 Summer Olympics]] [[Category:Basketball players at the 1972 Summer Olympics]] [[Category:EuroBasket-winning players]] [[Category:People from Kutaisi]] [[Category:Olympic medalists in basketball]] {{Georgia-basketball-bio-stub}} {{USSR-Olympic-medalist-stub}}
